df-itgo
blocks.content: A complex number is said to be integral over a subset if it is the root of a monic polynomial with coefficients from the subset. This definition is typically not used for fields but it works there, see ~ aaitgo . This definition could work for subsets of an arbitrary ring with a more general definition of polynomials. TODO: use ` Monic ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: df-za
blocks.content: Define an algebraic integer as a complex number which is the root of a monic integer polynomial. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Nov-2014.)

thm itgoval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  sylbir(wss(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(citgo, c0), crab(s0, cc, wrex(s1, cfv(cply, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(s1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(s1))), nat1))))), wcel(c0, cpw(cc)))
  elpw2(c0, cc)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cpw(cc), citgo, crab(s0, cc, wrex(s1, cfv(cply, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(s1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(s1))), nat1)))), crab(s0, cc, wrex(s1, cfv(cply, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(s1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(s1))), nat1)))))
  rabbidv(s0, cc, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, cfv(cply, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(s1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(s1))), nat1))), wrex(s1, cfv(cply, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(s1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(s1))), nat1))))
  rexeqdv(s1, cfv(cply, cv(hs0)), cfv(cply, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(s1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(s1))), nat1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cply)
  df-itgo(hs0, s0, s1)
  rabex(s0, cc, wrex(s1, cfv(cply, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(s1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(s1))), nat1))))
  cnex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cc))
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cc, wrex(s1, cfv(cply, c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(s1)), cfv(cdgr, cv(s1))), nat1)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cply, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cply, c0)
  diff.cply.s(s1)

  diff.hs0.s(s0)

thm itgoval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ ℂ →(IntgOver ` c0)= { s0 ∈ ℂ | ∃(s1 ∈(Poly ` c0),((s1 ` s0)= 0 ∧((coeff ` s1)`(deg ` s1))= 1))})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  sylbir(c0 ⊆ ℂ, (IntgOver ` c0)= { s0 ∈ ℂ | ∃(s1 ∈(Poly ` c0),((s1 ` s0)= 0 ∧((coeff ` s1)`(deg ` s1))= 1))}, c0 ∈ P(ℂ))
  elpw2(c0, cc)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, P(ℂ), citgo, { s0 ∈ ℂ | ∃(s1 ∈(Poly ` c0),((s1 ` s0)= 0 ∧((coeff ` s1)`(deg ` s1))= 1))}, { s0 ∈ ℂ | ∃(s1 ∈(Poly ` hs0),((s1 ` s0)= 0 ∧((coeff ` s1)`(deg ` s1))= 1))})
  rabbidv(s0, cc, hs0 = c0, ∃(s1 ∈(Poly ` hs0),((s1 ` s0)= 0 ∧((coeff ` s1)`(deg ` s1))= 1)), ∃(s1 ∈(Poly ` c0),((s1 ` s0)= 0 ∧((coeff ` s1)`(deg ` s1))= 1)))
  rexeqdv(s1, (Poly ` hs0), (Poly ` c0), hs0 = c0, ((s1 ` s0)= 0 ∧((coeff ` s1)`(deg ` s1))= 1))
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cply)
  df-itgo(hs0, s0, s1)
  rabex(s0, cc, ∃(s1 ∈(Poly ` c0),((s1 ` s0)= 0 ∧((coeff ` s1)`(deg ` s1))= 1)))
  cnex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(P(ℂ))
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈ ℂ | ∃(s1 ∈(Poly ` c0),((s1 ` s0)= 0 ∧((coeff ` s1)`(deg ` s1))= 1))})
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cply, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cply, c0)
  diff.cply.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, cexp)

  eleq1d(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), c2, co(c0, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c0, cexp)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), c2))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), c2, co(c0, cexp, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cexp)

  syl(w0, wcel(nat1, c2), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  subrg1cl(c2, ccnfld, nat1)
  cnfld1()
  a2d(wcel(cv(hs1), cn0), w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), c2), wcel(co(c0, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), c2))
  3exp(wcel(cv(hs1), cn0), w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), c2), wcel(co(c0, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), c2))
  eqeltrd(co(c0, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), c2, co(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), cmul, c0), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn0), w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), c2)))
  expp1d(c0, cv(hs1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn0), w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), c2)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(cv(hs1), cn0), w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), c2), wcel(c0, cc))
  sseldd(c0, cc, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c2, cc), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  subrgss(c2, ccnfld, cc)
  cnfldbas()
  simp1(wcel(cv(hs1), cn0), w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), c2))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), cn0), w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), c2)), wcel(co(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), cmul, c0), c2), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), c2), wcel(c0, c2))

thm cnsrexpcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  imbi2d(hs0 = c1, w0, (c0[^]hs0)∈ c2, (c0[^]c1)∈ c2)

  oveq2(hs0, c1, c0, cexp)
  eqeltrd((c0[^]0), c2, nat1, w0)

  syl(w0, 1 ∈ c2, c2 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld))

  eqeltrd((c0[^](hs1[+]1)), c2, ((c0[^]hs1)[×]c0), (hs1 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ w0 ∧(c0[^]hs1)∈ c2))
  expp1d(c0, hs1, (hs1 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ w0 ∧(c0[^]hs1)∈ c2))
  3ad2ant2(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, w0, (c0[^]hs1)∈ c2, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  sseldd(c0, cc, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ⊆ ℂ, c2 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld))

  simp1(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, w0, (c0[^]hs1)∈ c2)
  syl3anc((hs1 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ w0 ∧(c0[^]hs1)∈ c2), ((c0[^]hs1)[×]c0)∈ c2, c2 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld), (c0[^]hs1)∈ c2, c0 ∈ c2)
  3ad2ant2(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, w0, (c0[^]hs1)∈ c2, c2 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld))
  simp3(hs1 ∈ ℕ0, w0, (c0[^]hs1)∈ c2)

thm fsumcnsrcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  fsumcllem(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c2, cc), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  subrgss(c2, ccnfld, cc)
  cnfldbas()
  sylan(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), c2), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  3expb(wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), c2))

thm flcidc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0,((c1 ` s0)[×]c2))=[c3 / s0]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 =(s1 ∈ c0 ↦ if(s1 = c3, 1, 0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0,((c1 ` s0)[×]c2))=[c3 / s0]c2), d(s0, c1))
  3eqtr3d(sum(s0 ∈ c0,((c1 ` s0)[×]c2)), [c3 / s0]c2, sum(s0 ∈ { c3 },((c1 ` s0)[×]c2)), sum(s0 ∈ { c3 }, c2), w0)
  sumeq2dv(s0, { c3 }, ((c1 ` s0)[×]c2), c2, w0)
  eqtrd(((c1 ` s0)[×]c2), c2, (1[×]c2), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ { c3 }))
  oveq1d((c1 ` s0), cmul, c2, nat1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ { c3 }))
  eqtrd((c1 ` s0), nat1, if(s0 = c3, 1, 0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ { c3 }))
